comprehensive_overview: Libidn is an internationalized domain name library designed to help with the process of converting internationalized domain names to/from ASCII representation. It implements the Stringprep, Punycode and IDNA specifications defined by the IETF (Internet Engineering Task Force).
core_features: The core features of libidn include support for internationalized domain names (IDN), ASCII conversion, Punycode encoding/decoding, Unicode normalization, and IDNA (Internationalized Domain Names in Applications) compliance. It supports both IDNA2003 and IDNA2008 specifications.
